title: News24.com | SA's coronavirus death toll now at 25 after Western Cape man dies
description: A  61-year-old man from the Western Cape has died after testing positive for Covid-19, bringing the death toll in the country to 25.
content:
A  61-year-old
man from the Western Cape has died after testing positive for Covid-19,
bringing the death toll in the country to 25.
Health Minister Dr
Zwelini Mkhize confirmed the death on Saturday night, saying the man had underlying
health issues that… [+1191 chars]
